title: Chicken casserole
description: An easy chicken casserole recipe should be in every cook's little black book - add your favourite vegetables, herbs or a splash of wine.
ingredients: 4 chicken breasts, or 600g/1lb 5oz cooked leftover roast chicken
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 small head broccoli, cut into florets and blanched
1 tbsp chopped fresh parsley, to serve
